name: CSS Spacing
tagline: A simple CSS spacing library for margins, paddings, widths, heights and more written in Sass (SCSS)
body:
# CSS Spacing
A simple CSS spacing library for margins, paddings, widths, heights and more written in Sass (SCSS)

## Install with bower
``` shell
$ bower install css-spacing
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
